input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Valley Industries DF2.0-CSK 140 Degree Broadcast Deflector Sprayer Nozzle, Red

Product features:
Featuring a deflecting design that creates a 140 Degree wide-angle spray that reduces drift when laying chemicals
Features a larger orifice to reduce clogs and maintain a precise spray pattern
For best performance stay within 10-45 psi range.
Comes standard with 4 Deflector nozzles. Fits most manufacturer broadcast booms and Sprayers.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This red broadcast deflector nozzle from Valley Industries features a deflecting design that creates a wide-angle spray, reducing drift when laying chemicals. It features a larger orifice to reduce clogs and maintain a precise spray pattern. For best performance, stay within the 10-45 psi range. The DF2.0-CSK comes standard with 4 deflector nozzles and fits most manufacturer broadcast booms and sprayers.
input_text.Response B: Valley Industries DF2.0-CSK Broadcast Deflector Nozzle is made of brass and has a larger orifice to reduce clogs and maintain a precise spray pattern. Featuring a deflecting design that creates a 140 Degree wide-angle spray that reduces drift when laying chemicals. This nozzle is designed to fit most manufacturer broadcast booms and sprayers. For best performance stay within a 10-45 psi range. Comes standard with 4 Deflector nozzles. Available in Red.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
